titles.title: Nino's Act
Nino's Act
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide Medicaid coverage of drugs prescribed for certain research study child participants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Nino's Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for mandatory Medicaid coverage of drugs prescribed for certain research study child participants, regardless of Medicaid eligibility otherwise, if the state provides drug coverage.
